Yohane:Allure_of_Darkness.NAME: Allure Of Darkness
Yohane:Allure_of_Darkness.DESCRIPTION: Pay 2 Fallen Energy. NL Draw 2 Cards. NL Exhaust a card from your hand.
Yohane:Allure_of_Darkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards. NL Exhaust a card from your hand.

Yohane:Angel_Tears.NAME: Angel Tears
Yohane:Angel_Tears.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 8 Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Awakening.NAME: Awakening
Yohane:Awakening.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Fallen Energy. NL Deal !D! damage NL Evolve all Summons.

Yohane:Backfoot.NAME: Backfoot
Yohane:Backfoot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Counter.NAME: Counter
Yohane:Counter.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Fallen Energy. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage.

Yohane:Cursed_Strike.NAME: Cursed Strike
Yohane:Cursed_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Fallen Energy for each Curse in your draw pile.

Yohane:Dark_Rest.NAME: Dark Rest
Yohane:Dark_Rest.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !F! Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Dark_Shield.NAME: Dark Shield
Yohane:Dark_Shield.DESCRIPTION: Pay half of your Fallen Energy. NL Gain the same amount of Block.

Yohane:Defend_Grey.NAME: Defend
Yohane:Defend_Grey.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Descent.NAME: Descent
Yohane:Descent.DESCRIPTION: Pay !F! Fallen Energy. NL Apply !M! Sin.

Yohane:Envious.NAME: Envious
Yohane:Envious.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Copy all enemy Buffs and Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

Yohane:Excitement.NAME: Excitement
Yohane:Excitement.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half your Fallen Energy. NL Pay !M! Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Fallen_Dragon_Phoenix_Hold.NAME: Phoenix Hold
Yohane:Fallen_Dragon_Phoenix_Hold.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of the turn. NL Exhaust.

Yohane:Feather.NAME: Feather
Yohane:Feather.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Exhaust your hand except for Feathers and cards that say Feather at the end of the turn.

Yohane:Feather_Curse.NAME: Feather Curse
Yohane:Feather_Curse.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Feathers to your draw pile.

Yohane:Feather_Storm.NAME: Feather Storm
Yohane:Feather_Storm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Feathers from everywhere. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each.

Yohane:Feather_Tap.NAME: Feather Tap
Yohane:Feather_Tap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Feather to your hand.

Yohane:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
Yohane:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your entire hand. NL Gain !M! Fallen Energy for each.

Yohane:Go_All_Out.NAME: Go All Out
Yohane:Go_All_Out.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL non-attacks, gain !M! Fallen Energy for each. NL Draw 4 cards.

Yohane:Grand_Entrance.NAME: Grand Entrance
Yohane:Grand_Entrance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Fallen Energy. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.

Yohane:Guilty_Kiss.NAME: Guilty Kiss
Yohane:Guilty_Kiss.DESCRIPTION: If only [G]  was used, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If more was used, deal !D! damage X times.

Yohane:Hakodate.NAME: Hakodate
Yohane:Hakodate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Fallen Energy for every Summon.

Yohane:Hell_Zone.NAME: Hell Zone
Yohane:Hell_Zone.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your Fallen Energy to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.
Yohane:Hell_Zone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your Fallen Energy to ALL enemies. NL Retain.

Yohane:Ice_Cream_Assault.NAME: Ice Cream Assault
Yohane:Ice_Cream_Assault.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Fallen Energy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Slow until the end of the turn.

Yohane:Imagine_Breaker.NAME: Imagine Breaker
Yohane:Imagine_Breaker.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, lose all Fallen Energy. NL Gain the same amount of Block.

Yohane:Impressive_Display.NAME: Impressive Display
Yohane:Impressive_Display.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
Yohane:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Fallen Energy. NL Gain Blur.

Yohane:Kowareyasuki.NAME: Kowareyasuki
Yohane:Kowareyasuki.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

Yohane:Little_Demon_Lily.NAME: Little Demon Lily
Yohane:Little_Demon_Lily.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 Lily. NL Playing this card with Lily already on the field Evolves her.

Yohane:Little_Demon_Recruit.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! card that say Summon or Summons from your draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust
Yohane:Little_Demon_Recruit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! cards that says Summon or Summons from your draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust

Yohane:Livestream_Donation.NAME: Livestream Donation
Yohane:Livestream_Donation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !F! Fallen Energy. NL Draw a card for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

Yohane:Mijuku_Dreamer.DESCRIPTION: For each of your Summons, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust

Yohane:Miracle_Wave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Clumsy to your deck.

Yohane:Misfortune.NAME: Misfortune
Yohane:Misfortune.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to self. NL Gain 2 Strength.

Yohane:Modore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

Yohane:My_Mai_Tonight.NAME: My Mai Tonight

Yohane:Perfection.NAME: Perfection
Yohane:Perfection.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Fallen Energy. NL Deal damage equal to lost Fallen Energy.

Yohane:Retaliation.NAME: Retaliation

Yohane:Schwarz_Sechs.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Fallen Energy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL The next 0 cost card is played twice. NL Fallen Energy is still consumed.

Yohane:Silence.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage.
